name: Slogan Oversize Tee - Unisex
description: The Slogan Oversize Tee is a 60% cotton, 40% polyester, 230 GSM oversized shirt, designed for both active and lifestyle wear, with a true-to-size fit or a recommended size down for a regular fit.

name: Urban Stripe Tee
description: The Urban Stripe Tee is a regular-fit, 55% cotton, 45% polyester French terry shirt with contrast stripes, offering a comfortable, sporty look ideal for casual wear, with a 240 GSM fabric for durability and ease of movement.

name: ALL BLACK HYBRID DUFFEL
description: The Hybrid Duffle Bag is a versatile 2-in-1 backpack and duffel bag with 6 compartments, including a shoe compartment and an inner section for valuables, featuring durable zippers and a sleek black design with a black logo.

name: Essential Cut off Crop
description: The Essential Cut Off Crop is a versatile, loose-fit 100% cotton top perfect for lifestyle or training wear, offering comfort and adaptability for daily activities.

name: Premium Cargo Pants
description: The Premium Cargo Pants offer a relaxed fit with a tapered leg, six functional pockets, and a drawstring waistband, crafted from durable, high-quality fabric for both comfort and style, ideal for lifestyle and travel.

name: Gift Box - For Her
description: The 'Gift Box - For Her' is a curated collection of Carnage's finest activewear and essentials, including a Hydro Tumbler, Essential Everyday Tee, Classic Seamless Legging, and Visor Hat, all designed to enhance her fitness and style.

name: Performance Polo
description: The Performance Polo is a tapered, stretch-active dry fit shirt designed for athletes, offering a lightweight, comfortable fit with an athletic aesthetic, and is recommended to be worn true to size or one size up for a more relaxed fit.

name: Classic Zip Up Hoodie - Unisex
description: The Classic Zip-up Hoodie is a cozy, regular-fit fleece hoodie made from 80% cotton and 20% polyester, featuring a minimalist logo, adjustable drawstrings, and spacious pockets, perfect for casual wear and cooler weather.

name: Classic Hydrator Jug - 1 Ltr
description: The Classic Hydrator Jug - 1 Ltr in black is a durable stainless-steel water jug with a built-in straw, 1-liter capacity, a sleek matte finish, and a large handle for easy carrying.

name: Urban Short Sleeve Shirt
description: The Urban Short Sleeve Shirt is a tailored-fit, lightweight, breathable button-down shirt with a subtle texture, designed for versatile wear in both casual and polished settings.
